As Nature Intended: Give a Dog a Bone and Cat of the Day Cat Food

We make healthy registered raw cat and dog food, including a number of special recipes for dogs or cats with specific illnesses.  We also stock treats, hygiene products and supplements for pets. We do deliveries, and offer no contact deliveries if needed.  If any of our community is suffering financial hardship due to enforced isolation we will waive our delivery fees.  Please also support our initiative to help animal welfares. We support a number of animal welfare groups as far as is possible for a small business.  In addition to our regular donations, we will add an extra kg of food to every 1kg of our food that you buy to donate to animal welfare  (ie we will match your donation).  We also arrange delivery to these organisations where needed.

8 Albertyn Rd
Muizenberg
(Cnr Clevedon Rd - entrance in Clevedon)
